segments.text: I notice how the cookie jar is so inviting for the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t help feeling a sense of dread as the boy reaches for the lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if that stool tips over? It seems so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their delight in this moment is palpable, but it feels so wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying her plate, completely unaware of the unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a portrait of domestic life contrasting with underlying chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe how blind she is to the potential disaster lurking behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
